sentences.en: He was more partial to the house and environs.
sentences.cn: 他对这所房子和这里的环境越来越有感情了.

sentences.en: If you walk around the environs of Jermyn Street, you will find more diversity.
sentences.cn: 如果在杰明街附近走走, 你会发现更多更丰富的东西.

sentences.en: Most important of all, peaceful international environs should be maintained at all costs.
sentences.cn: 最重要的是, 要不惜一切代价维护国际间和平的氛围.

sentences.en: Oxford and its environs are worth a visit.
sentences.cn: 牛津及其郊区值得一游.

sentences.en: The architectural design and the details of the exterior elevations should complement the site and environs.
sentences.cn: 建筑设计和外部标高的详细资料应作为其所处位置及周边地区的补充.

sentences.en: The environs of Vienna are very beautiful.
The harsh desert environs of Klatooine resulted in a fiercely tenacious species.
sentences.cn: 克拉图因星苍凉的荒漠造就了这个坚韧顽强的种族.

sentences.en: The old city walls show that this area belonged to the captial city and its environs.
sentences.cn: 由旧城墙可以看出这里曾是隋朝的京畿.

sentences.en: The town and its environs are inviting, with recreational attractions and art museums.
sentences.cn: 那座小镇及其周边地区建有休闲胜地和艺术馆，很吸引人。

sentences.en: They even sought to keep the environs clean and the drains unpolluted.
sentences.cn: 他们还能保持环境清洁,而不污染水道.

words.tran_cn: 围绕；包围（environ的第三人称单数）

trans.tran_cn: 包围，环绕，（敌意地或保护性的）围住( environ的第三人称单数 )
